vps_terminate_question: Are you sure you want to delete your service {{vps}}?
vps_terminate_success: The deletion of the service has been taken into account, you will receive an email to confirm the deletion.
vps_terminate_error: An error occurred while deleting your service.
vps_terminate_unavailable: You purchased this subscription with a {{ monthCount }} month commitment. If you have any question, please contact customer support via chat or by submitting a support ticket . Thank you for your understanding.
vps_terminate_option_terminate_at_expira: Delete service on its expiry date
vps_terminate_option_terminate_now_descr: An email containing the procedure for deleting this service will be sent to you.
vps_terminate_warning_data_deletion: The deletion of your service will permanently erase all corresponding data.
vps_terminate_warning_no_refund: The process of deletion does not entitle you to a refund.
vps_terminate_warning_manual_refund: Deletion of your service does not guarantee that a refund will be issued. Please contact support if you have questions regarding the eligibility of a refund for this service.
vps_terminate_activate_delete_at_expirat: The deletion request for this service on its expiry date has been processed.
An error has occurred when submitting the deletion request for this service on its expiry date:
vps_terminate_deactivate_delete_at_expir: The deletion request for this service on its expiry date has been suspended.
An error has occurred when suspending the deletion request for this service on its expiry date:
